comment1: Normal comments are not allowed in JSON files and must be included as part of the data.
comment2: Supported data types are: objects ({}), arrays ([]), strings (""), numbers (no NaN or infinity) , booleans (true/false), and null.
comment3: JSON is often used for configuration files and data interchange between web clients and servers.
comment4: And in building this file, you'll realise that trailing commas are not allowed in JSON.
